plot: Jeremy Clarkson and James May investigate a type of tall hatchback called a 'crossover'. Since these cars are designed for caravanners, the pair pick examples from Mazda and Volkswagen and spend a couple of days living in them. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond is in Italy driving a £2m, 570 horsepower Sesto Elemento. Plus, Aerosmith legend Steven Tyler is the rock star in the Reasonably Priced Car.—Anonymous
